column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////But the food...OMG!  I don't think we had a single item that we didn't love!  Shrimp
column8: and I could go on and on!  A couple on the other side of the table ordered the paella
column9: and thankfully sent a sample to our side of the table
column10: and it was delicious as well!  There wasn't a single menu item that we didn't love
column11: and we actually re-ordered a few of the items because they were so delicious!!
